tool_description: An API used to list and search through out all the available movies. Can sort, filter, search and order the results
name: List Movies
title: List Movies

api_list.name: Limit
api_list.description: The limit of results per page that has been set
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://list-movies.p.rapidapi.com/list_movies.json/10"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "list-movies.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://list-movies.p.rapidapi.com/list_movies.json/{limit}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "list-movies.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Query Term
api_list.description: Used for movie search, matching on: Movie Title/IMDb Code, Actor Name/IMDb Code, Director Name/IMDb Code
